survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Retail
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their shopping experience on our online retail platform, focusing on satisfaction levels, ease of use, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall shopping experience on our platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall shopping experience on our platform?

questions.question_text: How easy was it to navigate our website and find the products you were looking for?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How easy was it to navigate our website and find the products you were looking for?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most useful on our platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand feature preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most useful on our platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our platform to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our platform to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for your most recent purchase on our platform?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for your most recent purchase on our platform?

questions.question_text: Please specify the primary reason for your most recent purchase if you selected 'Other'.
questions.client_notes: Ensure the text field is mobile-friendly and easy to use.

script.question_text: Please specify the primary reason for your most recent purchase if you selected 'Other'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery speed of your order?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery speed of your order?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the product(s) you received?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the product(s) you received?

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any issues during your shopping experience? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed feedback to identify pain points.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any issues during your shopping experience? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your shopping experience on our platform?
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed feedback to identify areas for improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your shopping experience on our platform?
